name: Crypsis
short_description:
Crypsis is a website phishing terminal/command line utility, written for educational / infosec related purposes. notable scripts akin to this would be SETs website attack vector/credential harvester, implemented by ReL1K of TrustedSec.

I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR ACTIONS!

This comes with the necessary html files to operate. most javascript has been striped out as well as form actions and a few hrefs so it works smoothly with the program.

*This is a Python2 script, will not work with Python3*

*Linux Users*
python crypsis.py -h

Support: irc.freenode.net #archseptem 
please report all bugs and troubleshooting information here.

"Oh, what a tangled web we weave when first we practice to deceive." --Sir Walter Scott
